nodes.text: First Order SCUBA troopers, also known as First Order underwater stormtroopers or simply SCUBA troopers, were stormtroopers of the First Order that were specialized to operate in aquatic environments. SCUBA troopers were deployed to the Colossus during the First Order's occupation. They were armed with a type of blaster that had a flashlight on the end.

First Order scuba troopers first appeared in the second half of the first season of the animated TV series Star Wars Resistance, in the episode "No Escape: Part 1." They were first seen in the season one mid-season trailer released on YouTube.
